about_the_game:
Once we all had dreams and looked forward to the future, but as time went by, most of us gradually live like their parents.

Whether you are free of the rules set by your parents, or you are more willing to follow your parents' advice, I hope this short visual game will bring you some small feelings.


When young: learn everything quickly, was praised by the elders that they are talented,

Youth: laughing and playing, gradually have ignorant feelings,

Youth: away from home, in order to live a life, although hard, but did not give up.

Middle age: have your own child, but with the child time, but less and less, for the family, your pressure becomes more and more big

Old age: take care of the child, seems to live like the father, feeling also accepted such an arrangement

name: 这是生活

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10,11
  • Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10,11
  • Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: A small game to experience the life of an ordinary person.
